title: 86/335/EEC: Commission Decision of 24 June 1986 approving an amendment to the programme relating to slaughtering, meat cutting and the utilization of slaughter by-products in France, pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 (Only the French text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 24 June 1986
approving an amendment to the programme relating to slaughtering, meat cutting and the utilization of slaughter by-products in France, pursuant to Council Regulation (EEC) No 355/77
(Only the French text is authentic)
(86/335/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The amendment to the programme relating to meat processing (slaughtering, cutting and utilization of slaughter by-products) forwarded by the French Government pursuant to Regulation (EEC) No 355/77 on 24 January 1986 concerning which supplementary information was submitted on 24 April 1986 is hereby approved.
This Decision is addressed to the French Republic.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 June 1986.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 51, 23. 2. 1977, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 372, 31. 12. 1985, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 97, 15. 4. 1980, p. 46.
